titles.title: To provide for the conversion of a temporary judgeship for the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E949)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

bill.summary:
5/3/2007--Introduced.
Converts a temporary judgeship for the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship.
